column1: @entity0 was going to make her auntie @entity2 toast. @entity0 got out the bread. @entity0 put the bread in to the toaster. After the bread went pop out of the toaster, @entity0 put butter on to half of the toast. Then @entity0 put jam on the other half of the toast. @entity0 got out a tray. @entity0 put the toast on a plate and then put the plate with the toast on to the tray. @entity0 put a flower on to the tray with the toast. @entity0 took the toast to her auntie @entity2. @entity1 was not in the bathroom. @entity0 heard her brother Tom in the bathroom. He was taking a shower. @entity1 was not in the kitchen. The only one in the kitchen was @entity0. @entity1 was not in the hallway. There was no one in the hallway. @entity0 found @entity1 in the bedroom. @entity1 was under her covers sound asleep. @entity0 woke up @entity1 and gave her the toast.
@placeholder are the names of the people in the story
